system.description: When your family has more Needs than Surpluses or faces a crisis that threatens survival, roll +Needs to see what desperate measures you must take.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: Desperation drives your family to extremes. The GM chooses two: your family fractures (take 2 Sleepers), you lose a significant asset, a rival takes advantage of your weakness, or you're forced into a terrible bargain.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: Your family struggles but survives. The GM chooses one: take 1 Sleepers, lose a minor asset, or accept a costly obligation. In return, you may address one of your Needs temporarily.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: Your family finds unexpected resources or allies. Address one of your Needs and improve your situation. You may also discover new opportunities born from adversity.
